name: Square Adventure (Dozer Games ®)
description:
by Yunus Doğan ÖZER

Goal

The goal of this game is to collect all treasures with your 
explorer. You shouldn't drop to fire. The hearts will 
help you. When you collect one of those, you add one heart. 
Also sometimes a bonus treasure appears. Get the highest 
score and don't drop.

Playing

You steer your explorer using the arrow keys. 

!!!(Hearts are refreshed in every epsiode)!!!

Levels

The game has seven levels. They become increasingly harder.
